availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

creation.placeName: New York, New York County, New York

body.p:
United States of America.
State of New York.
City and County of New York. } SS:

I, Joseph C. Levi, of the said City, County and State of New York, do swear, that I will well and truly execute and perform all the duties of my station, as a Commissioner for the State of Kentucky in New York, as required by law.
Subscribed & sworn to before me, at the City of New York aforesaid, this 20th day of September 1864.

figure.ab:
I. LAFAYETTE GOSLING
COMMISSIONER FOR KENTUCKY
NEW YORK CITY

body.p: Commissioner for the State of Kentucky in the City of New York

Joseph C. Levi
Commissioner for Kentucky in New York

figure.ab:
JOSEPH C. LEVI
COMMISSIONER -FOR- KENTUCKY
IN NEW YORK

body.p:
Joseph C. Levi
Commissioner for Kentucky in New York

Comr Deeds
Oath of Jos C. Levi
New York
filed 23d Sept/64
I enclose my afft. signature & seal as comr for Ky. in NY as requested by you.
